name: Cargo Truck Simulator Pro
description:
Best cargo truck simulator. Special price 50% OFF!!!

Drive on real trucks and transport your cargo, earn coins and unlock new features. Be the king of the road!

Features:
- Realistic truck physics
- Truck customization
- Day & night cycle
- Realistic damage, fuel and fatigue
- Tilting, buttons and steering wheel controls
- Interior Camera for all the trucks!
- Other 6 cameras to choose from
- Horns and truck sounds
- Cool and smooth 3D graphics
